body: @LightDash TL:DR - Moonies kicked the kid(girl's nephew) out i think, Yorihime's too important to be kicked out herself so she spends the rest of his life with him before going back to the moon

It's Yorihime's nephew, according to one of the official stories (Lunatic Runagate  i think) 
one of the two are married to Eiriin's grandnephew and the other is/was married to their son, in this case Toyohime's probably married to Eirin's kin and Yorihime's married(?) to her nephew. 

The part where they're not in paradise anymore (near the end) and Yorihime's waiting for death to part them might be reference to the fact you never see either of the Watatsuki sister's spouses in the series, the current time and according to this book, 200 years since.
Damn this shit was good at first then it got sad real fucking fast.
